title: Hon Issatsu de Kototariru Isekai Rurō Monogatari - Novel Updates
tags: Adventurers   Books   Cheats   Demi-Humans   Elves   Fantasy World   Firearms   Game Elements   Godly Powers   Gods   Hiding True Abilities   Level System   Magic Beasts   Male Protagonist   Monsters   Overpowered Protagonist   Reincarnated in Another World   Ruthless Protagonist   Skill Assimilation   Skill Creation   Special Abilities   Strong to Stronger   Sudden Strength Gain   Summoning Magic   Sword And Magic   Technological Gap
author: Yuuki Karaku   結城絡繰
description: An unfortunate high school student who died from an accident, Misasagi Ryou (陵陵). With God's whim, what he got from reincarnating to a different world, was one old book――taking in all kinds of books, it was the 「Unlimited Summoning Book」 that is said to be able to materialize all creations. Legendary Brave Equipments, Sub-Machine Guns, Artificial Humans……using weapons that are taken out from the book, the young man tramples the different world!! The different world Battle Fantasy of a young man that loves books!>
